opinion.post: I carefully read this article. I am interested in such a matter, even if I could not say I am sure what these phenomena really mean (Afterlife o creations of our brains!). Anyway, all this reminded me of a interesting experience recounted in a wonderful video interview that has been recently done to Mrs. Gabriella Magrini from Rome (Italy). She tells of her Near Death-Experience. You can watch this interesting video by clicking on the following link: http://www.liminamortis.org/back-from-afterlife/wonderful-garden/awakening-hidden-faculties/Ciao!
